subject: RE: [junit] Method Chains, was Re: Testing private methods
msgSnippet: I think this illustrates the advantage of writing the tests first, as you automatically write testable code. ... From: Matt Caswell
messageBody:
I think this illustrates the advantage of writing the tests first,
as you automatically write testable code.

-----Original Message-----
From: Matt Caswell [mailto:m.caswell@...]
Sent: Friday, June 01, 2001 10:44 AM
To: 'junit@yahoogroups.com '
Subject: RE: [junit] Method Chains, was Re: Testing private methods


Very interesting. It seems to me that you could use 1-5 in certain
circumstances. However I think I would be reluctant to change the way my
code was implemented just so that I could test it, as some of the other
posts on this topic have suggested you should do. [snip]
